metadata.name: Shadow Copies Deletion Using Operating Systems Utilities
metadata.comment: Shadow Copies deletion using operating systems utilities

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND ((endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wmic.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\vssadmin.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\diskshadow.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll', 'wmic\.exe', 'vssadmin\.exe', 'diskshadow\.exe')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shadow')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('delete')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\wbadmin.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('wbadmin.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('delete')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('catalog')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('quiet')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\vssadmin.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('vssadmin.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('resize')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shadowstorage')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('unbounded')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/maxsize=')))))

output.summary: Shadow Copies deletion using operating systems utilities
